==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=大肚黄|type=21|pregnant|Wong; Huang (surname)|lit=pregnant Wong}}

===Etymology===
From the resemblance of the character {{zh-l|黃|tr=-}} to a pregnant woman.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|c=daai6 tou5 wong4-2

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[Wong]] {{gloss|surname}}
#: {{zh-x|你 姓 大肚黃{wong4-2} 定係 三劃王 呀？|Is your surname "pregnant Wong" or "three-stroked Wong"?|C}}

====Usage notes====
The surnames {{zh-l|黃|tr=-}} and {{zh-l|*王}} are homophones in Cantonese, so {{zh-l|大肚黃}} and {{zh-l|三劃王|saam1 waak6 wong4}} are used to distinguish the two surnames.
